bibl.title: PSI XI 1183: Record of a Roman Census Declaration of A.D. 47/8.
bibl.note: P.S.I. XI, 1183 = C.P.L. 170 = Ch.L.A. XXV, 785. Oxyrhynchus, A.D. 47/8. Two copies (from a small archive) of a declaration in Latin of people and property made by a legionary veteran in Egypt, Lucius Pompeius Niger.

bibl.title: Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas

bibl.seg: RATHBONE Dominic, PSI XI 1183: Record of a Roman Census Declaration of A.D. 47/8.
Traianos GAGOS and Roger S. BAGNALL (Edd.), Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas = American Studies in Papyrology. 42 (Oakville, Connecticut, 2001) pp. 99-113 et pll. 8-9.

P.S.I. XI, 1183 = C.P.L. 170 = Ch.L.A. XXV, 785. Oxyrhynchus, A.D. 47/8. Two copies (from a small archive) of a declaration in Latin of people and property made by a legionary veteran in Egypt, Lucius Pompeius Niger.
